title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
August 30, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today by telephone with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan.  The two leaders confirmed their continuing, close cooperation on efforts to address North Korea’s launch of an intermediate range ballistic missile that overflew Japanese territory earlier this week.
